subject: Lockouts
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Stephen Gionta’s career got a lift last season when he played with the N.H.L.’s Devils. This season, with a lockout in effect, he and other Devils are honing their game in the American Hockey League.
snippet: Stephen Gionta’s career got a lift last season when he played with the N.H.L.’s Devils. This season, with a lockout in effect, he and other Devils are honing their game in the American Hockey League.
